page.title: 19FARMING AT BETHLIN
page.content: The farm manager at Bethlin manages 630 acres of farmland comprising spring barley,winter wheat, winter barley, oil seed rape and grass for grazing and silage.15% of the cereals grown are feed for the cows and sheep.Four men are employed on the farm as tractor men and stock-men. The machinery includes tractors, a forklift, a combine harvester as well as other farming implements.Of the five houses on the farmland only one cottage is occupied.Other buildings on the estate include a grain-store and cattle houses.
